      • ClientHandler

        ClientHandler​(MultitaskServer father,
              java.net.Socket myClientSocket,
              int myThreadId)
        ClientHandler class constructor.
        Parameters:
        father - the father server for the instance generated of this class.
        myClientSocket - a local socket that permits the communication between client and server.
        myThreadId - the id of the thread that manipulates the instanced client.
